documents.title: Standard Operating Procedure - User Access Management
documents.content: This document outlines the standard procedures for managing user access across all systems. It includes guidelines for account creation, modification, and deletion processes.
documents.author: IT Security Team

documents.title: Company Information Security Policy
documents.content: Comprehensive information security policy that defines the organization's approach to protecting sensitive data and information assets.
documents.author: IT Management

documents.title: HR Recruitment Process Guidelines
documents.content: Detailed guidelines for the recruitment process including job posting, candidate screening, interview procedures, and onboarding.
documents.author: HR Department

documents.title: Employee Benefits Policy
documents.content: Comprehensive policy covering all employee benefits including health insurance, retirement plans, vacation time, and other perks.
documents.author: HR Management

documents.title: Financial Reporting Standards
documents.content: Standards and procedures for financial reporting including monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements preparation.
documents.author: Finance Team

documents.title: Budget Management Policy
documents.content: Policy governing budget planning, allocation, monitoring, and control across all departments and projects.
documents.author: Finance Management

documents.title: Project Management Methodology
documents.content: Standard methodology for project management including initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, and closure phases.
documents.author: Project Management Office

documents.title: Change Management Policy
documents.content: Policy for managing organizational changes including communication strategies, stakeholder engagement, and implementation guidelines.
documents.author: Change Management Team

documents.title: Product Development Lifecycle
documents.content: Comprehensive guide for product development from concept to launch including design, testing, and market introduction phases.
documents.author: Product Development Team

documents.title: Intellectual Property Protection Policy
documents.content: Policy for protecting intellectual property including patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets.
documents.author: Legal Department

documents.title: Quality Assurance Testing Procedures
documents.content: Standard procedures for quality assurance testing including test planning, execution, reporting, and defect management.
documents.author: QA Team

documents.title: Quality Management System Policy
documents.content: Comprehensive quality management system policy ensuring consistent quality standards across all products and services.
documents.author: Quality Management

documents.title: Software Development Standards
documents.content: Standards and best practices for software development including coding standards, version control, and deployment procedures.
documents.author: Software Development Team

documents.title: Software Licensing Policy
documents.content: Policy governing software licensing including procurement, compliance, and usage monitoring across the organization.
documents.author: Software Asset Management

documents.title: Technical Documentation Standards
documents.content: Standards for creating and maintaining technical documentation including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
documents.author: Technical Writing Team

documents.title: Knowledge Management Policy
documents.content: Policy for managing organizational knowledge including documentation, sharing, and preservation of critical information.
documents.author: Knowledge Management Team

documents.title: Data Management Procedures
documents.content: Procedures for managing data including collection, storage, processing, and disposal in compliance with data protection regulations.
documents.author: Data Management Team

documents.title: Cloud Infrastructure Management
documents.content: Guidelines for managing cloud infrastructure including provisioning, monitoring, scaling, and cost optimization strategies.

documents.title: Disaster Recovery Plan
documents.content: Comprehensive disaster recovery plan including backup procedures, recovery time objectives, and business continuity strategies.

documents.title: Vendor Management Policy
documents.content: Policy for managing relationships with vendors and suppliers including selection criteria, performance monitoring, and contract management.
